Meal Plan: Oatmeal topped with fresh berries and a sprinkle of nuts or seeds
Greek yogurt with sliced banana and a drizzle of honey
Whole grain toast with avocado and poached eggs
Grilled chicken or tofu salad with mixed greens, vegetables, and a light vinaigrette dressing
Quinoa or brown rice bowl with black beans, roasted vegetables, and salsa
Turkey and vegetable wrap with whole grain tortilla and a side of fruit
Baked or grilled salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
Stir-fried vegetables with lean protein (chicken, tofu, shrimp) and brown rice
Turkey meatballs with whole wheat pasta and marinara sauce
Sliced apple with peanut butter or almond butter
Low-fat cottage cheese with sliced tomatoes
Whole grain crackers with low-fat cheese
